label: SpatialDimension
comment: A measure of spatial extent of an object, such as the length, breadth or height of a shipping container.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of spatial dimension, such as thickness, area, or volume.
The measure of the height component of this spatial dimension.
The measure of the length component of this spatial dimension.
The measure of the diameter component for this spatial dimension.
The measure of the width component of this spatial dimension.

referencedBy.comment: A linear dimension or a set of linear dimensions of this logistics packaging.
Maximum linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
Minimum linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
Spatial dimensions specified for this logistics means of transport.
